tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Sujay dental clinic is one of the best clinic I have seen in Bangalore. 
My mother had swollen, bleeding, sensitive gums and it was difficult to even drink cold water as sensitivity was more.
Best decision we ever made was to visit Sujay dental clinic. 
They got my mother's teeth x-ray, analysed, and Dr. Sujay Gopal, explained us what is the problem and step by step method of how it can be treated, what are the charges, how many sittings and he assured of getting it solved completely.
Since my mother was afraid of the pain, one of the nicest doctor of the clinic "Pragya Kaul" was assigned to treat, she has lot of patience *** *** ******* **** *****
Now my mother's teeth is absolutely fine, gums are strong and perfect.

Dr. Sujay, explain the problem very well, make us understand how they are planning to solve it, how many sitings, what are the charges.

The Doctors in the clinic are technically sound, use latest technologies, have lot of patience, try to understand and explain things, do the work keenly, they will do the best for the long term fix and wellness of teeth.

I would recommend this clinic for whosoever has dental challenges and want a perfect and long term solution.
reply_text: Thank you for your detailed feedback Ms shushma.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor Sujay is very friendly and his way of treating is excellent.My case is dental implantation and it is very rare case as I did not get permanent teeth in place of milk teeth and we tried many doctors but we did not get proper guidelines and way of treatment but after visiting Sujay'S clinic I got exact planning and implementation of planning was also very good. As we all know that implantation is very costly we also could not afford it but Doctor Sujay planned is such a way that I can afford the price also.Actually the While team is excellent all are friendly co-operative and even in the reception they are are very friendly
reply_text: Thanks for your kind words Ms Nalina.

review: I had swelling surrounding the wisdom tooth. There was a pus formation as well. Dr. Sujay looked into the tooth and explained me the issue properly and treated it.My husband contacted him for RCT. He explained how deep the infection is and treated it very nicely. Follow up calls were made. We are happy with the treatment. Thank you Doctor.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback Ms Yamini.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Overcrowded, ******** ***** **** **** ***** ****** ***** ******** ****** Appointments are not honored ,too much of waiting. I underwent a temporary fix of my crown for which I was charged heavily ( equivalent of product cost itself). It came off within a week of treatment which is fine as there wasn't a guarantee on how long it would last. But what's extremely disappointing is the after care service of this dental clinic. Despite repeated requests to call back and sort out my concern, they just don't bother to even hear you out. **** **** * *********** *** **** ******* ***** ****** * ******* *******
reply_text: Sorry to hear about that,
